name: Whirlipede

attacks.name: Rollout
attacks.effect: Deals 10 damage for each Rock Energy on Whirlipede. You may search your deck for a Rock Energy and attach it to Whirlipede. If you do, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Curl Up
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If either is heads, reduce damage taken next turn by 20. If both are heads, reduce damage taken next turn by 30. Either way, you may search your deck for a Rock Energy and attach it to Whirlipede. If you do, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Venom Spit
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

flavor: Surprisingly agile, some trainers take an unorthodox approach raising this Pokemon. Whirlipede races draw huge bets.
